The GameSystem class defines the reusable core game logic used by all Papa's Learneria mini-games (Grammar, Food, Nature).

SceneManager
The SceneManager class provides a centralised way to manage scene navigation, controller communication, and user session tracking across the Papa Learneria JavaFX application.
ScoreManager
The ScoreManager class provides a lightweight utility for recording player scores into the shared SQLite database used by Papa’s Learneria.

TimerSystem
The TimerSystem class provides a simple real-time timer mechanism for use in Papa’s Learneria mini-games and interactive sessions.
